member.name: SHCOLSTATE
member.summary: Describes how a property should be treated. These values are defined in Shtypes.h.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_DEFAULT
member.summary: The value is displayed according to default settings for the column.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_TYPE_STR
member.summary: The value is displayed as a string.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_TYPE_INT
member.summary: The value is displayed as an integer.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_TYPE_DATE
member.summary: The value is displayed as a date/time.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_TYPEMASK
member.summary: A mask for display type values SHCOLSTATE_TYPE_STR, SHCOLSTATE_TYPE_INT, and SHCOLSTATE_TYPE_DATE.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_ONBYDEFAULT
member.summary: The column should be on by default in Details view.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_SLOW
member.summary: Will be slow to compute. Perform on a background thread.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_EXTENDED
member.summary: Provided by a handler, not the folder.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_SECONDARYUI
member.summary: Not displayed in the context menu, but is listed in the More... dialog.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_HIDDEN
member.summary: Not displayed in the UI.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_PREFER_VARCMP
member.summary: VarCmp produces same result as .

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_PREFER_FMTCMP
member.summary: produces same result as .

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_NOSORTBYFOLDERNESS
member.summary: Do not sort folders separately.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_VIEWONLY
member.summary: Only displayed in the UI.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_BATCHREAD
member.summary: Marks columns with values that should be read in a batch.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_NO_GROUPBY
member.summary: Grouping is disabled for this column.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_FIXED_WIDTH
member.summary: Can't resize the column.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_NODPISCALE
member.summary: The width is the same in all dpi.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_FIXED_RATIO
member.summary: Fixed width and height ratio.

member.name: SHCOLSTATE.SHCOLSTATE_DISPLAYMASK
member.summary: Filters out new display flags.
